titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that Members who vote in favor of the establishment of a public, Federal Government run health insurance option are urged to forgo their right to participate in the Federal Employees Health Benefits Program (FEHBP) and agree to enroll under that public option.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: 6/10/2014--Introduced. Urges Members of Congress who vote in favor of the establishment of a public, federal government-run health insurance option to forgo their right to participate in the Federal Employees Health Benefits Program (FEHBP) and agree to enroll under that public option.
